resources.string: Sorry, but your current location is unknown. Share-A-Prayer does not allow users whom their current location is unknown to create or registers to places due to security restrictions.
Do you want to create a public praying place?
Please select at least one pray before creating a new place.
You are already registered to this place.
Would you like to register to this place?
You are not register to this place.
You can\'t delete this place, because you are not the owner.
